about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR Mobile Development PROJECTS
about.description:
Specializing in Android, Cross-Platform Solutions, and Secure Software Development With a passion for crafting clean, efficient code and intuitive user experiences, I transform ideas into scalable, high-performance applications. Leveraging expertise in Android development, MERN stack, and IoT integration, I deliver solutions that prioritize security, test-driven development (TDD), and agile methodologies. Whether itâ€™s building seamless mobile apps, optimizing cloud-based systems, or ensuring robust software quality, I thrive on creating impactful digital experiences.

Letâ€™s collaborate to build innovative, secure, and user-centric solutions that drive results. Together, we can turn your vision into reality.

allExperience.companyDescription: At OOB SMARTHOME, a leading IoT and smart home automation company, I played a pivotal role in developing and maintaining high-performance Android applications. Using Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Dagger Hilt, and RxJava, I optimized app architecture following MVVM/MVC principles, significantly improving maintainability and reducing bugs. I successfully integrated RESTful APIs, third-party payment gateways, and security best practices, ensuring a seamless and secure user experience. My contributions led to a 4.7/5 rating on the Google Play Store with 5,000+ downloads, enhancing user satisfaction and engagement. Additionally, I focused on performance optimization using Room Database and SQLite, reducing data retrieval time by 30%, while conducting rigorous unit and UI testing (JUnit, Espresso) to ensure application stability.

As a Junior Software Engineer at BrainyBeam Technologies, I worked on designing and developing scalable Android applications using Kotlin, XML, and Dagger Hilt while adhering to clean architecture principles. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate third-party APIs, improving app performance by 25% and ensuring 99% uptime. My contributions to streamlining development workflows and utilizing GitHub for version control and JIRA for agile task management led to delivering 5+ projects ahead of schedule. Additionally, I implemented Firebase Analytics to track user behavior, providing insights that boosted engagement by 10%. My ability to work efficiently in fast-paced agile environments helped accelerate release cycles and maintain high-quality standards.

During my internship at BrainyBeam Technologies, I gained hands-on experience in Android app development with Kotlin and Flutter, focusing on user-centric design and usability best practices. My work on integrating third-party APIs for data synchronization contributed to 98% app uptime, ensuring seamless cross-device performance. I actively collaborated with senior developers, following Git flow strategies and agile methodologies, which helped in the timely delivery of 5+ major feature enhancements. By prioritizing code quality, security, and optimization, I contributed to a 15% improvement in user engagement metrics, leading to higher app store ratings.

allTestimonial.reviewText: I have been lucky enough to study with Mann Ambani and have always been impressed by his dedication and hard work. He is diligent and always tries to learn and improve, especially in Android development. Whether in group projects or discussions during classes, Mann was always eager to give input, collaborate, and help others. His positive nature and acceptance of challenges made it very good to work with him. I have never doubted that he will carry the same dedication in any team he joins. I highly recommend him!

It was a great experience working with Mann Ambani on our Garden Nerds capstone project. As part of our academic team, Mann demonstrated a strong work ethic, technical expertise in Android development, and a solid understanding of entrepreneurship. His commitment to learning and his ability to contribute effectively to the team were invaluable. I have no doubt that Mann will continue to grow and achieve success in his career, and I highly recommend him for any future opportunities in Android development or beyond.

I had the pleasure of working with Mann Ambani on our capstone project, Garden Nerds, as part of our academic team. Mann brought great enthusiasm, creativity, and technical skills to the table. His contributions to the Android development aspect were impressive, and his ability to learn quickly and adapt to new challenges made him a valuable team member. Mannâ€™s collaborative attitude and problem-solving approach were key to the success of our project. Iâ€™m confident heâ€™ll excel in any future endeavors, and I highly recommend him.

I highly recommend Mann Ambani for any future Android development opportunities. He has been an exceptional asset to our team at OOB SMARTHOME over the past year, consistently delivering high-quality code and displaying a deep understanding of Android development principles. Mann's problem-solving skills and attention to detail have greatly contributed to the success and stability of our projects. Additionally, he is an excellent team player, always willing to collaborate and support fellow colleagues. His technical expertise, dedication, and positive attitude make him an outstanding junior Android developer deserving of recognition and further opportunities.
